author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oil in a pan and gently sauté the garlic and onion for 2-3 minutes or until soft.  Add the tomatoes and courgette and simmer for 8-10 minutes. To make the basil oil, place the basil, oil and seasoning in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve the soup in a bowl topped with a drizzle of basil oil.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  ½ onion, chopped,  200g/7oz tinned cherry tomatoes, chopped,  1 courgette, diced,  ¼ pint vegetable stock,  large handful basil,  4-6 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
